title: Trolls are the cancer/tumor to the game
body: When Sona helping my yi leash my red jungle, she last hit my red and took it without saying sorry. Furthermore....after took my red, she didnt even help me to leash another jungle monster. Even further insult to the team, she let her adc to die while she flashed for a kill but end up letting enemy adc took double kill together. Best Support Sona NA ever!

replies.body: The flash play is an understandable mistake but I think taking your red and then not leashing you might be a lack of experience.
Everyone who does something you do not like is not automatically a troll. People like you are part of the problem, though.
Ok then...so nxt time, if I did this to you, see how you feel and made you fall behind.

It's not about how it made you feel though, it's about whether or not she had the intention of trolling. Someone may make mistakes on good faith. That may still piss you off big time, but it doesn't necessarily means they're trolls.
Nobody cares. stop crying, play game and move on. Tilting yourself wont help.
